content:
# The attempt to harvest coal was mostly successful, as we successfully collected 10 units of coal. The inventory now reflects this change, showing that we have 10 units of coal.

# Next, we should focus on gathering iron ore, as we need iron plates for crafting additional items and structures. 

# I will locate the nearest iron ore resource and move there to start harvesting.

iron_position = nearest(Resource.IronOre)
move_to(iron_position)  # Move to the nearest iron ore resource patch.
